channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0543; 10:53AM; 1210 E 35th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S8G8wp; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 35 minutes. The fire extended from a room in the back of the house up into the attic. While conducting their primary search of the involved room, firefighters located a deceased victim. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation (protocol). LAFD PIO Captain Cody Weireter is responding for media availability. LA County Medical Examiner-Coroner will be the agency determining cause of death and patient identification. LAPD Inc# 1575 No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 E14 E15 E215 E221 E46 EM1 PI3 RA15 RA46 RA815 SO1 T15 T21; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0543; 10:46AM; 1210 E 35th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S8G8wp; Central-Alameda; While firefighters continued to fight the fire which extended into the attic, crews conducted a search of the involved room and located one patient. Sadly (adult male) the patient is beyond medical help and determined deceased on scene. LAFD Arson will respond for the investigation per protocol for a fatality. Any questions regarding the patient are referred to the LA County Medical Examiner-Coroner who will handle cause death and patient identification. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 E14 E15 E215 E221 E46 EM1 RA15 RA46 RA815 SO1 T15 T21; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0543; 10:18AM; 1210 E 35th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S8G8wp; Central-Alameda; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing upon arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and located fire in one room. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E14 E15 E215 E221 E46 RA15 RA815 T15 T21; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0217; 06:04AM; 1281 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/494axlr; Exposition Park; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews anticipated to be on scene for another hour for overhaul. No further details.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E46 RA15 RA34 RA815 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0217; 05:31AM; 1281 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/494axlr; Exposition Park; 25' x 75' vacant commercial building (site of previous burn) with fire through the roof. Firefighters are in the defensive mode and no additional resources are anticipated to be required. There are no injuries reported.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E46 RA15 RA34 RA815 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#1299; 06:46PM; 963 N Serrano Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46yLBRv; East Hollywood; The patient transported with serious burn injuries sadly was pronounced at the hospital, making this a fatality fire. The victim is a male estimated to be in his 60s. LAFD Arson is investigating and there is no additional information to release at this time.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC5 E227 E235 E52 E6 E61 E82 EM11 RA27 RA52 RA82 RA827 SO1 T27 T35; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1299; 05:56PM; 963 N Serrano Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46yLBRv; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the contents fire in 19 minutes. One patient with serious burn injuries being transported by LAFD paramedics (age/gender unknown at this time). LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation per protocol for serious injury. No further details.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E52 E6 E61 E82 EM11 RA27 RA52 RA82 SO1 T27 T35; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1299; 05:37PM; 963 N Serrano Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46yLBRv; East Hollywood; Two story duplex with moderate smoke showing from one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E52 E6 E82 RA52 RA82 SO1 T27 T35; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0244; 06:52AM; 1418 N New Hampshire Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/48YNDfr; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: This incident is now classified as a Major Emergency structure fire. Firefighters faced a heavily boarded up entry into and up to the involved area which caused a delay in reaching the seat of the fire. Once crews reached the two involved units in the corner of the building, they were able to conduct an effective fire attack and extinguished the fire with one hour on the incident clock. There are no injuries reported. LAFD PIO Captain Adam VanGerpen is enroute for media availability. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation per protocol for an incident of this size. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E12 E20 E202 E203 E211 E220 E227 E235 E250 E27 E3 E35 E56 E6 E61 E76 E82 EA1 EM1 EM55 HR3 RA27 RA35 RA803 RA827 RA835 SO1 SQ21 T11 T2 T20 T27 T3 T35 T50 UR27 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0244; 05:52AM; 1418 N New Hampshire Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/48YNDfr; East Hollywood; Two story vacant hotel property with fire on the 2nd floor. Roof ventilation has opened holes and has heavy fire through the holes. There are no other structures exposed. There are no injuries reported. This incident is at the Greater Alarm status.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E20 E211 E220 E227 E235 E250 E27 E3 E35 E56 E6 E76 E82 EM1 HR3 RA27 RA35 RA803 RA827 RA835 SO1 SQ21 T11 T20 T27 T35 T50 UR27 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart
